name: Operator Run
description:
Operator Run is a mini game about getting from A to B.

The Operator will start walking when the game starts, your job is to protect him by killing the monsters that are moving towards his direction. 
There's 3 tiers of monsters, each die by a different type of mouse click (click "Info" in game for more).

There's a total of 7 levels, each harder than the last. If you die, you must start over.

Your goal is to get the Dead God Armor on the 7th level at the end of the room. That's pretty much it, but it's quite a challenge, and it shouldn't take you more than 10 minutes to complete.
